about.details:
Incorporation in 2015, Rite Zone Chemcon India Limited deals in a range of construction chemicals and concrete products. The company offers complete construction solutions by supplying a complete range of various chemical products related to civil construction, infrastructure, building & structure including pre-construction or post construction as well as supplying all types of concrete required for construction and infrastructure developments.

The company's products include Concrete Admixture, Water Proofing Systems, Concrete Lubricators, Engineering Grouts, Industrial Flooring, Concrete Repairs, Curing Compound & Mould Release Agents, Surface Treatment, Tiling & Block Products.

Rite Zone Chemcon India Limited outsource the chemical products production to a third-party manufacturer. The company has also tied up with concrete manufacturers in Maharashtra for concrete production.

Strengths:

  • Wide product portfolio with a focus on quality.
  • Quality Assurance and customer satisfaction.
  • Asset Light business model with low fixed overheads.
  • R&D set up for constant product improvement and new product development.
  • Longstanding customer relationships leading to increased business opportunities.
  • Existing committed workforce.

faqs.question: What is the Rite Zone Chemcon IPO?
faqs.answer:
Rite Zone Chemcon IPO is a SME IPO of 1195200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹8.96 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on October 31, 2022, and closes on November 2, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Rite Zone Chemcon IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Rite Zone Chemcon IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Rite Zone Chemcon IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Rite Zone Chemcon IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Rite Zone Chemcon IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Rite Zone Chemcon IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Rite Zone Chemcon IPO opens on October 31, 2022 and closes on November 2, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Rite Zone Chemcon IPO?
faqs.answer: Rite Zone Chemcon IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Rite Zone Chemcon IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Rite Zone Chemcon IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Rite Zone Chemcon IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Rite Zone Chemcon IPO will be done on Monday, November 7, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, November 10, 2022. Check the Rite Zone Chemcon IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Rite Zone Chemcon IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Rite Zone Chemcon IPO listing date is on Friday, November 11, 2022.
